scripts.test: docker run --rm --network host -v $(pwd):/work/ -w /work/ -it mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v1.51.1-noble /bin/bash -c 'npm i && npx playwright test'
scripts.test:update: docker run --rm --network host -v $(pwd):/work/ -w /work/ -it mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v1.51.1-noble /bin/bash -c 'npm i && npx playwright test --update-snapshots'
